mapper.insert: insert into PBCRS_REPORT_ENCREDITLIMSGMT (CREDITLIMSGMTSEQNO, CREDITLIMTYPE, LIMLOOPFLG, CREDITLIM, CY, CONEFFDATE, CONEXPDATE, CONSTATUS, CREDITRESTCODE, CREDITREST,REPORTFLAG) values (#{CreditLimSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CreditLimType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{LimLoopFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CreditLim,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Cy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ConEffDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ConExpDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ConStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CreditRestCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CreditRest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ReportFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update PBCRS_REPORT_ENCREDITLIMSGMT set CREDITLIMTYPE = #{CreditLimType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LIMLOOPFLG = #{LimLoopFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREDITLIM = #{CreditLim,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CY = #{Cy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONEFFDATE = #{ConEffDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONEXPDATE = #{ConExpDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONSTATUS = #{ConStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREDITRESTCODE = #{CreditRestCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREDITREST = #{CreditRest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPORTFLAG = #{ReportFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where CREDITLIMSGMTSEQNO = #{CreditLimSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select CREDITLIMSGMTSEQNO, CREDITLIMTYPE, LIMLOOPFLG, CREDITLIM, CY, CONEFFDATE, CONEXPDATE, CONSTATUS, CREDITRESTCODE, CREDITREST,REPORTFLAG from PBCRS_REPORT_ENCREDITLIMSGMT where CREDITLIMSGMTSEQNO = #{CreditLimSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select CREDITLIMSGMTSEQNO, CREDITLIMTYPE, LIMLOOPFLG, CREDITLIM, CY, CONEFFDATE, CONEXPDATE, CONSTATUS, CREDITRESTCODE, CREDITREST,REPORTFLAG from PBCRS_REPORT_ENCREDITLIMSGMT
select info.* from PBCRS_REPORT_ENCREDITLIMSGMT info where info.CreditLimSgmtSeqNo= #{EnCtrctInfSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select info.* from PBCRS_REPORT_ENCREDITLIMSGMT info where info.CreditLimSgmtSeqNo= #{EnCtrctInfSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into PBCRS_REPORT_ENCREDITLIMSGMTM (CREDITLIMSGMTSEQNO, CREDITLIMTYPE, LIMLOOPFLG, CREDITLIM, CY, CONEFFDATE, CONEXPDATE, CONSTATUS, CREDITRESTCODE, CREDITREST,REPORTFLAG,etl_date) select CREDITLIMSGMTSEQNO, CREDITLIMTYPE, LIMLOOPFLG, CREDITLIM, CY, CONEFFDATE, CONEXPDATE, CONSTATUS, CREDITRESTCODE, CREDITREST,'0',to_date(to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') from PBCRS_REPORT_ENCREDITLIMSGMT where CREDITLIMSGMTSEQNO = #{CreditLimSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update PBCRS_REPORT_ENCREDITLIMSGMT set PARAGRAPHDEL = #{isDel} where CREDITLIMSGMTSEQNO = #{EnCtrctDelSeqNo}
mapper.select: select count(1) from PBCRS_REPORT_ENCREDITLIMSGMT where CREDITLIMSGMTSEQNO =#{0} and PARAGRAPHDEL='1'
